ejemplos: Hello, how are you?
I said hello to my neighbor this morning.
When I entered the room, everyone said hello.
Hello, everyone!

definicion: Animal de cuatro patas que usualmente  se tiene como mascota o se entrena para trabajar.
ejemplos: I have a dog named Max.
Dogs are known for their loyalty to humans.
Many people love to play fetch with their dogs.
I live in a small house in the suburbs.
Houses come in many different architectural styles.
They are renovating their old house.
I'm hungry; let's eat dinner.
Eating a balanced diet is important for your health.
She doesn't eat meat; she's a vegetarian.

definicion: Consumir líquidos a través de la boca.
ejemplos: I like to drink water throughout the day.
Drinking too much alcohol can be harmful to your health.
Would you like to drink some coffee?

definicion: Un estado de descanso natural, generalmente durante la noche.
ejemplos: I need to sleep for at least eight hours to feel rested.
Some people have trouble sleeping at night.
She fell asleep while reading a book.

definicion: Un objeto compuesto por páginas impresas o en blanco, generalmente contenido en una cubierta.
ejemplos: I love to read a good book on a rainy day.
This library has a vast collection of books.
She's writing a book about her travels.

definicion: Un ser humano en las primeras etapas de su vida, generalmente antes de la adolescencia.
ejemplos: My child starts kindergarten next year.
Children need love and care as they grow up.
The playground is full of happy children.
I'm going to school to study mathematics.
The school is closed for the summer vacation.
She's a teacher at the local elementary school.

definicion: Artículos que las personas usan para cubrir sus cuerpos.
ejemplos: I need to buy some new clothing for the winter.
She has a wardrobe full of stylish clothes.
It's important to choose appropriate clothing for different occasions.
